name: Empty Posts/Pages
author: Aaron D. Campbell

sections.description: Empty posts/pages still get wrapped in tags, which makes them invalid. This plugin fixes that. It looks like 2.5 no longer places empty paragraph tags in a post/page, however it does still add a br tag. For WordPress 2.5+, this plugin removes that br tag, which can be very nice when you expect to let a template do all the formatting. PHP5 Required.
sections.installation:
1. Verify that you have PHP5, which is required for this plugin.
  2. Upload wp-empty.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Empty posts/pages still get wrapped in tags, which makes them invalid.  This plugin fixes that.  PHP5 Required.
